comment: In 1892, at "Cafe' de la Regence" a tournament was organized among the strongest players who were present in Paris at that time. The prize was 500 francs. Janowsky and Sittenfeld were those who play against each other in the final match. The result, in favour of our hero, was +7 -5 =5. The game which is now presented here won the beauty prize of 30 francs.
